tool_description: Convert HTML Webpages to beautiful PDF-Files. Create PDF-Invoices, Documents or Flyers right from your App with our high quality PDF converter.
name: HTML to PDF
title: HTML to PDF

api_list.name: HTML to PDF
api_list.description: Submit the URL of the HTML you want to convert. You can also provide a list of space-separated URLs that will be merged into the same PDF-File.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the HTML you want to convert into a PDF or a list of multiple URLs separated by space (%20).

optional_parameters.name: viewport
optional_parameters.description: Size of the "browser window" that renders your page (default: 1366x768)

optional_parameters.name: margin-left
optional_parameters.description: margin in millimeters on left border

optional_parameters.name: margin-bottom
optional_parameters.description: margin in millimeters on bottom border

optional_parameters.name: margin-top
optional_parameters.description: margin in millimeters on top border

optional_parameters.name: dpi
optional_parameters.description: change the dpi of the document (default: 75)

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: What to return: "data": binary data of pdf or "fileurl": url of generated pdf-file for download

optional_parameters.name: grayscale
optional_parameters.description: Render the pdf in greyscale (default: false)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Paper format: A4, letter, A3, ... (default: A4)

optional_parameters.name: margin
optional_parameters.description: margin in millimeters on all 4 borders (default: 0)

optional_parameters.name: margin-right
optional_parameters.description: margin in millimeters on right border
